snippet: The cases were the last of the so-called bellwether cases intended to help define settlement options after the recall of 2.6 million vehicles in 2014....
abstract: General Motors announces settlement of last two cases resulting from faulty ignition switch linked to 124 deaths and 275 injuries.
lead_paragraph: The cases were the last of the so-called bellwether cases intended to help define settlement options after the recall of 2.6 million vehicles in 2014.

headline.main: G.M. Settles 2 Cases Claiming Faulty Ignition Switches
headline.print_headline: G.M. Settles Two Cases Claiming Ignition Flaw
